channel.title: About the Author :: Digital Dilemma
channel.description: Digital Dilemma / digdilem / Flash / Flasheart / Simon Avery An old geek from Dartmoor I’ve been a labourer, tree surgeon, van driver, maintenance worker, fundraiser and managing director of a horse charity. Currently I’m a Linux Sysadmin happily working for a Sports company in Exeter, England. I have always been a geek, and fairly recently self-diagnosed as Autistic. This follows an early formal diagnosis of Dyslexia. Re-evaluating my life with this information has led to a lot of “Of course!” moments…
